info.title: Navigate forwards to a checked radio button within a radio group

references.linkText: APG Example: Radio Group  Using aria-activedescendant

raw.name: JAWS
raw.defaultConfigurationInstructionsHTML: Configure JAWS with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.

instructions: Press <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Delete</kbd> to determine which cursor is active.
If the PC cursor is active, press <kbd>Escape</kbd> to activate the virtual cursor.
Press <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Delete</kbd> to determine which cursor is active.
If the virtual cursor is active, press <kbd>Insert</kbd>+<kbd>z</kbd> to disable the virtual cursor.

setupScript.scriptDescription: sets focus on the first radio button, and checks the  second radio button
setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstRadioButtonAndCheckSecondRadioButton

instructions.instructions: Starting at the 'Regular crust' radio button, navigate to the 'Deep dish' radio button.

virtualCursor: Configure JAWS with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.
Press <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Delete</kbd> to determine which cursor is active.
If the PC cursor is active, press <kbd>Escape</kbd> to activate the virtual cursor.

assertions.assertionStatement: Name of the radio button, 'Deep dish', is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey name of the radio button, 'Deep dish'

assertions.assertionStatement: State of the radio button, 'checked', is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey state of the radio button, 'checked'

assertions.assertionStatement: Position of the radio button, 2, is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey position of the radio button, 2

assertions.assertionStatement: Number of radio buttons in the group, 3, is conveyed
assertions.assertionPhrase: convey number of radio buttons in the group, 3
